{{HideN|标题=中文Minecraft Wiki黑暗面|内容={{quote|很难把他评论......得完全......#(滑稽) 他虽是个比较负沢任的行政员，但是高看自己很明显，自己有了想法完全就不管其他人的意见了。 ——[[User:Chdkfd|Chdkfd]]评价中文mcwiki行政员Powup333}} {{quote| 那这个群是主要聊正经的事还是可以欢快一点的皮？我不想得罪powup（之前在Crowdin吵过架） 我在所有中文平台发表自己对掠夺者的意见，结果繁体中文的管理员就很有礼貌的给我相关文件网址参考，而简体中文的管理员就不停的嘴炮我，那个人就是pow 后来他说不过我，因为有别的人支持我，所以他就把所有历史给删掉了 我听很多MC翻译者和讨论者抱怨过管理员的事，表示如果Hytale需要人手的话都会跑过去那里 ——AlanWong评价中文mcwiki行政员Powup333}} {{quote|pow关于译名的决定 是不用负责的
你们不掌握决定权，自己去搞讨论，背锅的是你们
译名那边权限是mojang直接管的
mojang对pow的信任那可是… ——[[User:Wikiworker|Wikiworker]]评价中文mcwiki行政员Powup333}} {{quote| Chinese Minecraft Wiki - Please help us! (Sorry for the grammar mistake) According to Dinoguy's decision, an admin who has no edits or admin actions for a year will be considerd to be "Inactive", our local bureaucrat Craft_Lawrence matches this criteria. He is one of the architects of zh-Wiki and has devoted himself to make a great contribution with it, which is worth celebrating and admiring. However, all of us know that bureaucrat is a very important position and it is the core of an admin team. Thus, we need a more active and efficient person to inherit his place so that the zh-Wiki can get better development! '''Here I want to talk about an active bureaucrat called Powup333. ''' He used to be a common editor before twice promoted by Lawrence. However he hopes zh-Wiki to work according to his personal willing. He seldom communicates with us but has his own way of doing things. For example, when we are ardently discussing about the translation of "Update Aquatic", suddenly he jumped out and decided a translation personality and all of us stop chatting instantly. It makes me feel depressed. He might have been a bureaucrat for that, but it's really hard. Anyway, again, we need a more active and efficient person to inherit Lawrence's place. I hope zh-Wiki can radiate new vitality and hope you will have the problem solved. Thank you! I think there is only one bureaucrat may cause the situation of dictatorship, so there should be at least 2 bureaucrats. Please, do not send the original mail to anyone except Curse stuff, do not send the original mail to local adimin noticeboard to avoid unforeseen circumstances. Thankful comprehending! Sincerely, Anonymous ——Democratic Petition (February 2017) }} {{quote|禁止转发本群消息，勿谓言之不预也。 —— STATE SECRET of Chinese Minecraft Wiki QQ Group rule}} }} {{用户信息 |本名=Angrydog001 |好友=[[User:Chdkfd]] |敌人=spam |活动范围=Gamepedia及其子域名
